column5: Private room & shared bath 6 miles or 10 mins (no traffic) from downtown. Your room is clean, 1/2 the price of a budget hotel, has a 5 star rating, & is completely private (lock/key). Come enjoy the comfort of home in a unique East Austin neighborhood that combines the feel of a quirky Mayberry, while doing its part to keep Austin weird. Convenient to shopping, Mueller & Austin entertainment.
